EmailTemplate.subject: Wishing you a very Happy Birthday {!Contact.Name}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.Name},
We all know that you are a hardworking and dedicated employee, and we appreciate everything you do for our team. However, today is your day to forget about work and celebrate your birthday with wild abandon. Let's make some unforgettable memories, laugh until our bellies hurt, and dance like there's no tomorrow!
Happy birthday from all of us at Cloud Peritus. May this year bring you everything you desire, both personally and professionally.
Regards,
The Cloud Peritus Team
